name: Zombie Boing-Boing Free
description:
Welcome to The Apocalypse! Sheriff Buck Justice needs YOUR help to survive the endless hoards of ravenous Zombies in the big city.

The Walking Dead are Everywhere!

It's ALL up to YOU:

Help Buck Justice bounce around the city collecting coins, weapons and
other bonus items. Don't let the Zombies eat him alive.

Warning! Watch out for grenades! They will stop Buck Justice dead in his
tracks. How fast are your reflexes? Your goal is to keep Buck Justice alive.
Our Zombies are mighty hungry..."Braaains!"


Zombie Boing-Boing game features include:

* Unlimited Levels of Fast Action and Fun
* Challenging Game Experience: Obstacles and Bonus Items
* Cool Characters and Graphics
* Game Center Leaderboards and Achievements
* Compatible with iPhone, iPad, iPad Mini and iPod Touch

We welcome your suggestions and feedback.

Have fun!

The Violet 2000 Team
